next.task: Nova Life OS: Mobile Quick Capture

overnightBuilds.title: Habit Streaks Dashboard
overnightBuilds.description: Unified habit tracker with streaks, heatmap, and daily check-ins. Pre-loaded with English Practice, 300 Figures Quiz, and Trading Journal habits.

overnightBuilds.title: Knowledge Graph Viewer
overnightBuilds.description: Dashboard to browse all entities in Nova's memory: people, companies, projects, investments. Shows summaries and active facts for each entity. Includes sync script to keep data fresh.

overnightBuilds.title: Meta Ads Knowledge Base
overnightBuilds.description: Searchable dashboard of Meta Ads expert strategies. Features 12 experts (8 researched), topic filtering (Creative/Structure/Bidding/Scaling/Tracking), key frameworks, and quick-reference tactics. Built to make the Deep Research findings easily accessible during campaign work.

overnightBuilds.title: Copy Progress Dashboard
overnightBuilds.description: Visual tracker for the Alessa product descriptions project. Shows 50% progress (477/952), session history chart, milestone bar, and estimated days to completion. Motivational messages based on progress percentage.

overnightBuilds.title: Macro Calculator
overnightBuilds.description: Quick food macro lookup tool for nutrition tracking. 100+ foods database with instant calories, protein, carbs, fat. Supports grams, ounces, and piece-based units. Includes micronutrient tags and copy-to-clipboard for easy logging.
